system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in.

description.value:
The Brawler Leads the charge into melee, brandishing Chainsword and knives as extensions of themselves. They are often Giants amongst men, barely feeling that which would fell many others.

Effects: Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with that of the Brawler. Apt: Agility, Finesse, Offence, Strength, Toughness, Weapon Skill Add. Equipment: Best Great Weapon or Good Chainsword or Common Power Maul, Best Mono-Knife. Gain Talents: Ambidextrous+Street Fighting or Pugilist Can Purchase Unique Talent Two Against the Odds and Basic Order Watch My Back!
